TDI.name: TDI
TDI.description:
Javascript library which enables the communication between the UI and the application, using the Infusion AJAX protocol.

Minimum jQuery version required for TDI is 1.7.0.

TDI.Ajax.name: TDI.Ajax
TDI.Ajax.description:
Basic Ajax functionality for the TDI library. Used to bind DOM events to desired HTML elements and send the TDI request when the events fire.

Requires TDI global object.

TDI.Ajax.Request.name: TDI.Ajax.Request
TDI.Ajax.Request.description: The Request API for the TDI Ajax. Provides methods to send TDI requests.

TDI.Ajax.Response.name: TDI.Ajax.Response
TDI.Ajax.Response.description: The Response API for the TDI AJAX. Provides a set of custom tdi events which can be used to control or to react to the TDI responses.

TDI.Tools.name: TDI.Tools
TDI.Tools.description:
A set of tools for the TDI library.

Requires TDI global object.

classitems.description:
Selectors for ajax enabled elements:

  • a.tdi
  • form.tdi
  • form.tdi input[type=submit], form.tdi button
  • select.tdi, input[type=checkbox].tdi, input[type=radio].tdi
  • input[type=text].tdi
classitems.name: _delegateSelectors

classitems.description:
Bind all the needed DOM events for Ajax enabled elements:

  • onclick - ajax enabled links and submit buttons
  • onsubmit - ajax enabled forms
  • onchange - ajax enabled form fields
  • onunload - window
classitems.name: _bindUI

classitems.description:
Unbind all previously attached DOM event handlers:

  • onclick
  • onsubmit
  • onchange
  • onunload
classitems.name: _unbindUI

classitems.description: The link onclick event handler. Used to trigger the preventable tdi:ajax:beforeLinkClick event.
classitems.name: _onBeforeLinkClick

classitems.description:
Fires before the link is clicked (before the link action is executed).

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (_onLinkClick).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeLinkClick

classitems.description: The link onclick event handler.
classitems.name: _onLinkClick

classitems.description: The form onsubmit event handler. Used to trigger the preventable tdi:ajax:beforeFormSubmit event.
classitems.name: _onBeforeFormSubmit

classitems.description:
Fires before the form is submited.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (_onFormSubmit).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeFormSubmit

classitems.description: The form onsubmit event default method.
classitems.name: _onFormSubmit

classitems.description: Saves the name and value of the submit button which the user used to submit the form.
classitems.name: _onFormButtonActivate

classitems.description: The field onchange event handler. If the field has the data-ajax-url attribute it is used as the trigger element. Otherwise, the fields form is considered to be the trigger element.
classitems.name: _onFieldChange

classitems.description: The field onkeydown event handler. If the field has the data-ajax-url attribute, a TDI ajax request is sent when Enter is pressed.
classitems.name: _onFieldSubmit

classitems.description:
Universal method for sending a TDI.Ajax call. It is called internaly for all Ajax enabled elements (like Links, Forms, Selects, Inputs). This method may be used in other scripts as TDI.Ajax.send( elm ); where the elm parameter points to the element, which would trigger the Ajax call if it was Ajax enabled.

There are some HTML attributes of the element, which are used to configure the call:
href The target URL of the Ajax call
action The same as href
data-ajax-url The target URL of the Ajax call. Used if the Ajax URL should be different than the one defined by href or action attributes, or if the HTML element does not have URL attributes (select, input, ...)
method The HTTP method to be used for the Ajax request. Only for Form elements. Forms with <input type="file"> elements will have forced POST method!
data-ajax-method The HTTP method to be used for the Ajax request. The same as method but applicable for all elements. If used on Form element, it has precedence before method attribute (except Forms with file fields which have always POST method). Defaults to GET.
data-related-element A selector pointing to a related element. This element(s) gets notified when the Ajax call starts/ends.
rel (deprecated; use data-related-element instead) The same as data-related-element
data-related-ancestor A selector pointing to a related parent element. This element gets notified when the Ajax call starts/ends
data-confirm A confirmation message. Use when the user should be able to stop the Ajax call
disabled The Ajax call does not start if the element has the disabled atribute set
class="disabled" The Ajax call does not start if the element has a disabled class name
classitems.name: send

params.name: elm
params.description: The element which is used as a trigger for the Ajax call.

params.name: callbacks
params.description:
An optional set of callbacks:
beforeStart <Function> If it returns false, the AJAX call and the default start callback will not be executed.
start <Function>
beforeEnd <Function> If it returns false, the default end callback will not be executed.
end <Function>

classitems.description: Sends the Ajax request and calls the needed callback methods.
classitems.name: send

params.name: options
params.description:
Aditional request options:
method <String> The HTTP method used to send the request. Defaults to get.
data <(String|Object)> Data to be sent to the server. It is converted to a query string, if not already a string. See jQuery documentation for $.ajax()
sync <(Boolean)> Whether the AJAX request should be synchronous or not. Defaults to false
beforeStart <Function> Function to be called before the request is sent. If this function returns false, the request is not sent. This function is called with parameters:
xhr <jqXHR> the jqXHR object
settings <Object> The settings map used in the jQuery $.ajax call
options <Object> Aditional request options
start <Function> Function to be called before the request is sent. This function is called with parameters:
xhr <jqXHR> The jqXHR object
settings <Object> The settings map used in the jQuery $.ajax call
options <Object> Aditional request options
beforeEnd <Function> Function to be called after the request is complete. If this function returns false, the default end callback is not executed. This function is called with parameters:
xhr <jqXHR> The jqXHR object
textStatus <String> Status of the request ("success", "notmodified", "error", "timeout", "abort", or "parsererror")
options <Object> Aditional request options
end <Function> Function to be called after the request is complete. This function is called with parameters:
xhr <jqXHR> The jqXHR object
textStatus <String> Status of the request ("success", "notmodified", "error", "timeout", "abort", or "parsererror")
options <Object> Aditional request options

classitems.description: Submits a form using an Iframe (fake Ajax call).
classitems.name: sendForm

params.name: form
params.description: The form element which will be sent.

params.name: options
params.description:
Aditional request options:
beforeStart <Function> Function to be called before the request is sent. If this function returns false, the request is not sent. This function is called with parameters:
form <jQuery> The form which is to be submited
options <Object> Aditional request options
start <Function> Function to be called before the request is sent. This function is called with parameters:
form <jQuery> The form which is to be submited
options <Object> Aditional request options
beforeEnd <Function> Function to be called after the request is complete. If this function returns false, the default end callback is not executed. This function is called with parameters:
form <jQuery> The form which was submited
options <Object> Aditional request options
xml <jQuery> The response XML document
end <Function> Function to be called after the request is complete. This function is called with parameters:
form <jQuery> The form which was submited
options <Object> Aditional request options
xml <jQuery> The response XML document

classitems.description: Modifies the URL and adds an Ajax (tdi) flag.
classitems.name: ajaxifyUrl

classitems.description: The default start callback.
classitems.name: _start

classitems.description: Fires when the TDI request has started.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:start

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
xhr <jqXHR> The jqXHR object
options <Array> Additional request options
settings <Array> The Ajax settings

classitems.description: The default success callback.
classitems.name: _success

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI <update>s are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:updatesDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
updates <Array> The list of all updates
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI <insert>s are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:insertsDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
inserts <Array> The list of all inserts
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI <script>s are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:scriptsDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
scripts <Array> The list of all scripts
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI <style>s are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:stylesDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
styles <Array> The list of all styles
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI <popup>s are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:popupsDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
popups <Array> The list of all popups
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all <unknown> TDI instructions are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:unknownsDone

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
instructions <Array> The list of all unknown instructions
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires when all TDI actions are done.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:done

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
responses <Array> The list of all TDI actions
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: The default error callback.
classitems.name: _error

classitems.description: Fires when the Ajax request ends with an error.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:error

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
status <Array> The XHR status text (if available)
message <Array> The error message
xhr <jqXHR> The jqXHR object (see jQuery documentation for jQuery.ajax())
textStatus <String> The XHR text status (if available)
options <Array> Additional request options

classitems.description: The default end callback.
classitems.name: _end

classitems.description: Fires when the TDI request has ended.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:end

classitems.description: The beforeUpdate callback. It takes the <update> xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default update action.
classitems.name: _onBeforeUpdate

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI update takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onUpdateDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeUpdate

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
target_id <String> The ID of the update target
selector <String> CSS selector for multiple targets
target <jQuery> The update target
content <String> The update contents
content_empty <Boolean> Indicates whether the contents are empty
replace <String> Indicates whether the contents will replace the whole target
append <String> Indicates whether the contents will be appended to the end of the target
prepend <String> Indicates whether the contents will be prepended to the beginning of the target
class_add <String> Space separated list of class names to add
class_remove <String> Space separates list of class names to remove

classitems.description: The beforeInsert callback. It takes the <insert> xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default insert action.
classitems.name: _onBeforeInsert

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI insert takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onInsertDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeInsert

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
target_id <String> The ID of the update target
target <jQuery> The update target
content <String> The contents
position <String> The position of the insert (before|after)

classitems.description: The beforeScript callback. It takes the <script> xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default script action.
classitems.name: _onBeforeScript

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI script takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onScriptDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeScript

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
script_src <String> Path to the external Javascript file
script_data <String> Inline Javascript code
script_id <String> ID of the <script> tag

classitems.description: The beforeStyle callback. It takes the <style> xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default style action.
classitems.name: _onBeforeStyle

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI style takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onStyleDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeStyle

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
style_src <String> Path to the external CSS file
style_id <String> ID of the <link> tag

classitems.description: The beforeReload callback. It just reloads the page.
classitems.name: _onBeforeReload

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI reload takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onReloadDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeReload

classitems.description: The before redirect callback. It takes the <redirect> xml node, gets its data and redirects the page to the given URL.
classitems.name: _onBeforeRedirect

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI redirect takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onRedirectDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeRedirect

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
href <String> The URL to redirect to

classitems.description: The beforePopup callback. It takes the <popup> xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default popup action.
classitems.name: _onBeforePopup

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI popup takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onPopupDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforePopup

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
href <String> The URL of the popup
mode <String> The mode of the popup (popup|dialog)
width <Integer> Width of the popup. Available only for dialog mode
height <Integer> Height of the popup. Available only for dialog mode

classitems.description: The beforeUnknown callback. It takes an unknown instruction xml node, gets its data and triggers a custom event which can stop the default unknown action.
classitems.name: _onBeforeUnknown

classitems.description:
Fires before the TDI instruction takes place.

This event is preventable. Use preventDefault() to prevent the default action (Response._onUnknownDefault).
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:beforeUnknown

classitems.description: The update default response handler. Updates the specified target with new contents.
classitems.name: _onUpdateDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The update data object:
target_id <String> The ID of the target element
selector <String> CSS selector for multiple targets
target <jQuery> The target element
content <String> The new HTML contents
replace <String> ("true"|"false") Whether to update the targets contents, or to replace the whole target
append <String> ("true"|"false") Whether to append the new contents at the end of the target
prepend <String> ("true"|"false") Whether to prepend the new contents at the begining of the target
class_add <String> CSS class name(s) which will be added to the target. Multiple class names are separated by a space
class_remove <String> CSS class name(s) which will be added to the target. Multiple class names are separated by a space
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI update takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:update

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
target_id <String> The ID of the update target
target <jQuery> The update target
content <String> The update contents
content_empty <Boolean> Indicates whether the contents are empty
replace <String> Indicates whether the contents will replace the whole target
append <String> Indicates whether the contents will be appended to the end of the target
prepend <String> Indicates whether the contents will be prepended to the beginning of the target
class_add <String> Space separated list of class names to add
class_remove <String> Space separates list of class names to remove
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The insert default response handler. Inserts the contents before/after the target.
classitems.name: _onInsertDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The insert data object:
target_id <String> The ID of the target element
target <jQuery> The target element
content <String> The new HTML contents
position <String> ("before"|"after") Whether to insert the contents before, or after the target
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI insert takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:insert

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
target_id <String> The ID of the update target
target <jQuery> The update target
content <String> The contents
position <String> The position of the insert (before|after)
inserted_node <jQuery> Reference to the inserted HTML node
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The script default response handler. Loads and executes new scripts.
classitems.name: _onScriptDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The script data object:
script_src <String> URL of the new external script
script_data <String> Inline script data
script_id <String> ID of the <script> tag
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI script takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:script

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
script_src <String> Path to the external Javascript file
script_data <String> Inline Javascript code
script_id <String> ID of the <script> tag
script_node <jQuery> Reference to the inserted <script> node
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The style default response handler. Loads external stylesheets.
classitems.name: _onStyleDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The style data object:
style_src <String> URL of the new external stylesheet
style_id <String> ID of the <link> tag
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI style takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:style

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
style_src <String> Path to the external CSS file
style_id <String> ID of the <link> tag
style_node <jQuery> Reference to the inserted <link> node
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The reload default response handler. Reloads the page.
classitems.name: _onReloadDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The reload data object
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The redirect default response handler. Redirects the page to a given URL.
classitems.name: _onRedirectDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The redirect data object:
href <String> URL of the redirect
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The popup default response handler.
classitems.name: _onPopupDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The popup data object:
href <String> Target URL of the popup
mode <String> ("popup"|"dialog") The type of the popup
width <Integer> Width of the popup in mode "dialog"
height <Integer> Height of the popup in mode "dialog"
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI popup takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:popup

params.name: data
params.description:
The event data:
href <String> The URL of the popup
mode <String> The mode of the popup (popup|dialog)
width <Integer> Width of the popup. Available only for dialog mode
height <Integer> Height of the popup. Available only for dialog mode
popup <window> Reference to the opened window
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: The unknown instruction default response handler.
classitems.name: _onUnknownDefault

params.name: data
params.description:
The dialog data object:
contents <String> Instruction contents
options <Object> Additional request options

classitems.description: Fires after the TDI unknown instruction takes place.
classitems.name: tdi:ajax:unknown

classitems.description: Loads an external javascript file. It uses a 'script tag' technique instead of AJAX, so the loaded javascript file is debugable in tools like Firebug.
classitems.name: getScript

params.name: url
params.description: URL of the external javascript file

params.name: options
params.description:
Additional options
complete <Function> It is called when the javascript is fully loaded.
id <String> An optional id attribute of the script tag.

classitems.description: Loads an external CSS file. It uses AJAX to load the CSS data to provide the complete event.
classitems.name: getStyle

params.name: url
params.description: URL of the external CSS file

params.name: options
params.description:
Additional options
complete <Function> It is called when the CSS file is fully loaded.
id <String> An optional id attribute of the style tag.
